game.name: The Withered
game.genres: 어드벤처, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: Step into a decaying open world where every decision means survival. The Withered is our upcoming zombie survival game, blending horror, exploration, and crafting in a vast post-apocalyptic environment. Face the undead, gather scarce resources, and uncover the truth hidden in the ruins.
